Articles.Content: ive been playing the game for about a week now and i realised i am missing the 3.75 meter parts, i have no clue how that happened but im wondering how i can fix it

Can you check to have the NASAsission folder within GameData, where also the Squad folder is? All 3.75 mt parts are in there, seems like somehow that folder is missing in your install.

Also, and in any case, please follow the bug reporting guide, info mentioned there is crucial to provide support.
THE HELL!! the folder does not exist, i have the squad folder with no NASA mission folder anywhere, can you possibly upload that folder because the guide does not really help that much

Can you check to have the NASAsission folder within GameData, where also the Squad folder is? All 3.75 mt parts are in there, seems like somehow that folder is missing in your install.

Also, and in any case, please follow the bug reporting guide, info mentioned there is crucial to provide support.

the NASAmission folder does not exist as well as this forum confuses the hell outa me so how can i exactly get the NASAmission folder back i use windows 8.1 32 bit 6GB ram and 1TB memory with an I3 Core and a quite bad but is going to be replaced soon intel HD 4400 graphics card:P
The NASAmission folder is part of the game download. You can verify the integrity of the game files through Steam, use the Launcher's Update tool, or reinstall completely.
